createSession((address,address,address,u.details: 必须确保时间不重叠，且owner拥有足够的奖励代币

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns._0: 待领取的LP质押奖励数量

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._gamma: gamma值(scaled by 1e18), 范围[0, 1e18], 建议0.5e18~0.7e18

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

checkIn(uint256).notice: 用户签到(需距离上次签到至少5分钟)

getPendingRewards(uint256,address).notice: 查询用户的所有待领取奖励(质押奖励 + boost奖励)

pendingBoostReward(uint256,address).notice: 查询用户的boost奖励(使用新的分池权重法)

pendingReward(uint256,address).notice: 查询用户待领取的LP质押奖励

setGamma(uint256,uint256).notice: 设置指定session的gamma参数(boost奖励分配权重)

withdraw(uint256).notice: 用户提取本金和所有奖励(只能在session结束后)
